name: rest_api
description: - It works on Server-Client architecture - It provides standards for communication btw Server and Client - If server sends an HTML file to client...then client like browser can use it but clien t like alexa, mobile can't use it. - So require such a raw format for response that can be useful for all type of client like :- JSON, XML - If client is surely Browser that is known then we can use HTML format, which reduce client side work - Always Respect HTTP methods... GET, POST, PUT, PATCH, DELETE - Don't use POST method to update or delete user. - for update use : patch method - for delete use : delete method
